name: Boat Duty!
description:
Description:

You are located in the middle of the lake. Your task? Collect many different items, Including rocks, glass bottles, tires, wood & Tin cans and make a bunch of stuff with them. You should aim for an Oxygen Upgrade, since your oxygen is limited, wooden floors/walls, glass walls, a radio station, a television station and lots of letters in order to notify the world of the current situation that it is; Filled to the brim with rubbish.

Controls: Normal:

Move Mouse: Look around
WASD: Move/Drive Boat
Spacebar: Jump/Swim Upwards
Ctrl: Sprint
Shift: Crouch

Tab: Open/Close Inventory
E:Colect Trash/Interact

Q: Exit Boat/Building System

Building System:

Left Click: Build blueprint
Right Click: Remove Build

Mouse Scrollwheel: Rotate blueprint
+: Increase Blueprint Height
-: Decrease Blueprint Height

Current Bugs:

Tech Bench placed position and interact collision box are a little off.

Tv Station position is a little off.

Radio Station position is a little off.

Swimming Upwards causes a super jump of sorts.

Hitting the bottom of the lake sometimes makes you unable to swim upwards.
